synopsis.text: Unsure of why their highly-anticipated debut has been abruptly postponed, the aspiring members of Lovedol's third generation, along with their determined manager Tomohiro Fujisawa, embark on a quest to uncover the missing piece to their idol group puzzle. As a popular pop-idol group with two successful generations already established, the pressure is on for this new lineup to live up to the Lovedol legacy. Tomohiro's search leads him to Mizuki, a talented street guitarist, who might just be the key to unlocking the group's true potential and securing their place in the spotlight. Will this unexpected addition be the answer to their problems, or will the third generation of Lovedols remain shrouded in mystery? Join them on their journey to stardom and find out if they have what it takes to captivate audiences and make their dreams a reality.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
